channel.title: CVE Feed for Dassault Systèmes -- SIMULIA 3DOrchestrate
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Dassault Systèmes -- SIMULIA 3DOrchestrate

item.title: CVE-2023-1997|2023-08-28T15:37:21.969Z -- dassault%20syst%C3%A8mes -- simulia%203dorchestrate
item.description: An OS Command Injection vulnerability exists in SIMULIA 3DOrchestrate from Release 3DEXPERIENCE R2021x through Release 3DEXPERIENCE R2023x. A specially crafted HTTP request can lead to arbitrary command execution.
